metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6582 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Doorkeeper gem before 4.2.0 for Ruby might allow remote attackers to conduct replay attacks or revoke arbitrary tokens by leveraging failure to implement the OAuth 2.0 Token Revocation specification.

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
